00113 inline bool CVarColor::IsSimilar(const CVarColor& color, double tolerance) const
00114 {
00115        return GetDistance(color) <= tolerance;
00116 }

00119 inline bool CVarColor::IsNormalized() const
00120 {
00121        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00122 
00123        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00124               double component = GetElement(i);
00125 
00126               if ((component < 0) && (component > 1)){
00127                      return false;
00128               }
00129        }
00130 
00131        return true;
00132 }
